breakfast.name: Error parsing response
breakfast.description: There was an error generating meal suggestions. Please try again with simpler criteria.

lunch.name: High-Protein Chicken Fried Rice
lunch.description: A protein-packed fried rice featuring chicken breast, eggs, and brown rice for a satisfying lunch.
instructions: Dice chicken breast into small cubes
Heat oil in a large pan over medium-high heat
Cook chicken until no longer pink (about 5-6 minutes)
Push chicken to one side and crack eggs into the pan
Scramble eggs until cooked, then mix with chicken
Add cooked brown rice and minced garlic, stir-fry for 3 minutes
Add soy sauce and chopped green onions, mix well
Cook for another 2 minutes until everything is heated through

dinner.name: Chicken Fried Rice with Eggs
dinner.description: A protein-packed fried rice dish featuring chicken breast, eggs, and brown rice.
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions and set aside.
Dice chicken breast into small cubes.
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and saut√© for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add chicken and cook until no longer pink, about 5-6 minutes.
Push chicken to one side of the pan, crack eggs on the other side and scramble.
Once eggs are cooked, mix with chicken.
Add cooked rice to the pan and mix well.
Season with soy sauce, salt, and pepper.
Stir-fry for another 3-4 minutes until everything is well combined and heated through.

breakfast.name: High-Protein Chicken & Egg Fried Rice
breakfast.description: A protein-packed breakfast bowl combining chicken, eggs, and rice for sustained energy.
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions
Dice chicken breast into small cubes
Heat oil in a pan and cook chicken until no longer pink (5-6 minutes)
Beat eggs and add to the pan with chicken, scrambling until cooked
Add cooked rice to the pan and mix well
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Stir-fry for 2-3 more minutes until everything is well combined and hot

lunch.name: Chicken and Egg Fried Rice
lunch.description: A protein-packed fried rice with diced chicken breast and scrambled eggs mixed with fluffy white rice.
instructions: Dice chicken breast into small cubes
Heat oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat
Cook chicken until no longer pink (about 5-6 minutes)
Push chicken to one side, crack eggs into the pan and scramble
Add cooked rice and mix everything together
Add soy sauce, minced garlic, and sliced green onions
Stir-fry for another 3-4 minutes until everything is well combined and hot

dinner.name: Chicken Fried Rice
dinner.description: A protein-packed fried rice with chunks of chicken and scrambled eggs, perfect for a high-protein dinner.
instructions: Dice chicken breast into small cubes
Heat oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat
Cook chicken until no longer pink, about 5-6 minutes
Push chicken to one side and crack eggs into the pan
Scramble the eggs until cooked through
Add cooked rice and mix everything together
Add soy sauce, minced garlic, and chopped green onions
Stir-fry for another 3-4 minutes until everything is well combined and heated through

breakfast.name: High-Protein Chicken & Egg Fried Rice
breakfast.description: A protein-packed breakfast bowl combining chicken, eggs and rice in a savory stir-fry.
instructions: Dice chicken breast into small cubes
Heat oil in a large pan over medium-high heat
Cook chicken until no longer pink (about 5-6 minutes)
Push chicken to one side of the pan and crack eggs on the other side
Scramble eggs until just set, then mix with chicken
Add cooked rice and stir to combine
Season with soy sauce, salt and pepper
Garnish with chopped green onions before serving

lunch.name: Chicken Fried Rice Bowl
lunch.description: A high-protein lunch combining tender chicken pieces with fluffy rice and scrambled eggs.
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions.
Dice chicken breast into small cubes.
Heat olive oil in a pan and cook chicken until no longer pink (5-7 minutes).
Push chicken to one side of the pan and scramble the eggs on the other side.
Add cooked rice to the pan and mix everything together.
Season with soy sauce and minced garlic, stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes.

dinner.name: Chicken Fried Rice
dinner.description: A protein-packed fried rice with chunks of chicken and scrambled eggs for a satisfying dinner.
instructions: Dice chicken breast into small cubes
Heat oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat
Cook chicken until no longer pink, about 5-6 minutes
Push chicken to one side, crack eggs into the empty space and scramble
Add cooked rice and mix everything together
Add soy sauce, minced garlic, and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes
Garnish with chopped green onions before serving
